card_text: Apply any of the following effect(s) in sequence, depending on the Type(s) of Effect Monster you control.$N●Fairy: You can draw 3 cards, then place 2 cards from your hand on the bottom of your Deck in any order.$N●Fiend: You can make your opponent draw 1 card, then discard 1 random card, then if they still have a card in their hand, they discard 1 card.$NYou can only activate 1 "Stained Glass of Light & Dark" per turn.
